text:
Had an amazing breakfast with our JRT at On Pause cafe on a weekday morning.

A fantastically pet friendly environment with both non-aircon & aircon seating available.

We had the "all-day" breakfast plate and mushroom truffle soup, which turned out to be absolutely delicious! 😊 Food portions are generous and it reminds me of lazy summer morning cafe brunches back in the UK!

Our JRT had a free "PupCup" containing whipped cream & honey! She slurped up the whole cup in a jiffy! 🐶

We will definitely be back again soon! 👍

yummy strawberry matcha and pesto pasta!! the portobello mushrooms were well seasoned, crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside, and the truffle mushroom soup was flavourful and decadent. will keep coming back again 👍🏼

I frequent On Pause a little too much for my own good. I was drawn to this place initially as it’s dog friendly which makes for a good spot to enjoy a nice lunch/breakfast with my dog. Over time, I’ve come to enjoy the food, ambience and the warm service from their team. I have tried a number of their items on the menu and is really fond of their Prawn and Guac tartine. Not sure if their portobello burger is still on the menu but that’s a good one too. Banana chocolate cake was really tasty too. I only wish that it’s easier to find a parking spot there!

Loving the vibes here...everyday is weekend! Pet friendly too and my Frenchie had a nice time chilling here.

Food is absolutely delectable. Missing here is the ham and cheese toastie - everything is so good!!

Will be back.

their steak was okay, nothing special. the bolognese was a lil bland and tater tots were not as seasoned for my liking…  prices are like your average cafe prices. atmosphere was great! pet friendly aswell 🫶🫶🫶 and service staff on the other hand was super friendly!!!
